hightlight_section.content: Accept payments from customers by scanning the QR barcode with the Fpay app. Payments get settled in your bank account.

heading.subheading: You can make the transfer immediately and the other party can verify the payment

why-cards-data.description: You can make the transfer immediately and the other party can verify the payment
No need to charge again and again like card swiping machine
No extra cost of generating paper receipt
No pollution and side effect of our product
We store data in encrypted format and keep eyes continuously on hackers. You can immediately report a fraud.

heading.subheading: Six powerful reasons to choose us rather than other payments gateways

choose-us-cards.title: Instant activation
choose-us-cards.content: Francepay offers 100% online onboarding with minimum dosumentation to help your business go online with ease.

choose-us-cards.title: Easy Integration
choose-us-cards.content: Use Francepay's robust API and custom SDK's to start accepting digital payments in less than 30 minutes using just a few lines of code.

choose-us-cards.title: 100+ payment sources
choose-us-cards.content: Allow your customers to pay the way they want with support for debit and credit cards, Netbanking, UPI, F-Pay wallet & much more.

choose-us-cards.title: Industry-best success rates
choose-us-cards.content: With Francepay's intelligent routing & direct bank integrations, we ensure that your customers' payments go through every time.

choose-us-cards.title: Frane's most widely-used checkout
choose-us-cards.content: We aim to provide over 3000 business with Francepay checkout services & can give customers the checkout experince they love.

choose-us-cards.title: Dedicated Support
choose-us-cards.content: All online merchants and payment gateway users on Francepay will get dedicated support via a toll-free number and email.

video-slide.subheading: We store data in encrypted format and keep eyes continuously on hackers.
